header_text: At your routine doctor’s appointment, you are asked to take a test for a disease. After the test, you wait for your results in the waiting room for a long time. You think the chances that you have the disease are minimal.

elements.Text: Do you think the test results will say you have the disease?

elements.name: At your routine doctor’s appointment, you are asked to take a test for a disease. After the test, you wait for your results in the waiting room for a long time. You think the chances that you have the disease are minimal. _Physical Health_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
